snippet: Evgeni Malkin, Pittsburgh’s Russian star, had missed nine games but scored two goals in his first game back.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Pittsburgh Penguins rally to beat Winnipeg Jets, 6-5; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Evgeni Malkin, Pittsburgh’s Russian star, had missed nine games but scored two goals in his first game back.

headline.main: Malkin Returns From Injury to Lead Penguins Over Jets
headline.print_headline: Malkin Returns From Injury To Lead Penguins Over Jets
